Basketball.description: He is considered to be the Greatest Player of All Time by many. Collect his card today!
He is considered to be the one of the greatest shooters of all time in NBA history. Collect his card today!
He is a young star player on the Mavs that will continue to dominate the NBA for awhile. Collect his card today!

Football.description: Jalen Hurts is the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles and led them to Superbowl 57. Collect his card today!
Patrick Mahomes is the starting quarterback for the Kansas City Chiefs and led his team to a Superbowl 57 victory. Collect his card today!
Justin Jefferson a starting wide reciever for the Minnesota Vikings. He is a young talent. Collect his card today!
